Title: Picturethrill
Description:
Downloads Picture of the Day from various sites and sets them as Wallpaper Desktop Background.

Currently supported sites:
Bing, NASA, National Geographic, and Earth Science.

Use wonderful Space, Nature, Science, Places, People, and other pictures as your desktop background wallpaper, or simply enjoy your ever growing collection in image viewer such as Picasa.

Other websites can easily be supported as well.

Technologies: C# WPF
HomeWiki:
Picturethrill is a free app that downloads "Pictures of the Day" from sites you select and wallpapers them for you. Fresh pictures everyday!

Click the link on the right to Download the Windows version.

Instructions:
  1. (Optional) Donate to support development efforts of Picturethrill by Kodi Studios
  2. Download Picturethrill App
  3. Click "Install" button.
  4. Select site that you want daily wallpapers from.
  5. Click "Wallpaper" to wallpaper picture.
  6. Close it

That's it! It will do the rest for you :)

Every day you will get a new wallpaper background on your windows desktop.

List of websites that currently support to get images from:
  • Bing - http://bing.com
  • NASA - http://apod.nasa.gov
  • Earth Science - http://epod.usra.edu
  • National Geographic - http://photography.nationalgeographic.com/photography/photo-of-the-day
  • Wikipedia - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Pictureofthe_day
  • Nature - http://www.naturepicoftheday.com

Support for many more websites is coming soon!

List of Supported OS:
  • Windows 7
  • Windows 8

Coming Soon:
  • Macintosh OSX
  • Android
